Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects

Class NetLobbyPreparation

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetLobbyPreparation
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class NetLobbyPreparation
extends NetObject
This is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server when the players are inside a lobby.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    NetLobbyPreparation next  
    int order  
    java.lang.String player  

    Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects.NetObject

    message, serialUID

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg)
    Creates a standard message and only calls the super constructor.
    NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, int order)
    It creates a lobby message with a player's name and its order on the lobby.
    NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, int order, NetLobbyPreparation next)
    It creates a lobby message with a player's name and its order on the lobby concatenating this player information with the given information in next field.
    NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, NetLobbyPreparation next)
    It creates a lobby message with the information of the first player inside the lobby and concatenates this player information with the given information in next field.

    • NetLobbyPreparation

      public NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      Creates a standard message and only calls the super constructor.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - is msg is null

    • NetLobbyPreparation

      public NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, int order) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      It creates a lobby message with a player's name and its order on the lobby.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      player - is the player's name
      order - is the player's order in the lobby
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null or if player is null

    • NetLobbyPreparation

      public NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, int order, NetLobbyPreparation next) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      It creates a lobby message with a player's name and its order on the lobby concatenating this player information with the given information in next field.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      player - is the player's name
      order - is the player's order in the lobby
      next - is the next lobby message to connect
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null or if player is null

    • NetLobbyPreparation

      public NetLobbyPreparation​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String player, NetLobbyPreparation next) throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      It creates a lobby message with the information of the first player inside the lobby and concatenates this player information with the given information in next field.
      Parameters:
      msg - is the message to be sent
      player - is the player's name
      next - is the next lobby message to connect
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null or if player is null
